title: EUPHORIA: The Art of "Stealing" Explained... | Video Essay

media:group.media:title: EUPHORIA: The Art of "Stealing" Explained... | Video Essay
media:group.media:description:
Upon watching season 2 of Euphoria it dawned on me that there are a lot of movie references in this show, but also references to musicvideos, popular series, TV shows and art. It made me wonder: Is Euphoria simply copying all these elements, or is there a hidden meaning behind it all? In this Video Essay I am analyzing and explaining the ideas behind these forms of symbolism to see how Euphoria is referring to popular culture. So let's find out why Good Artists copy and Great artists steal...

Story, narration and editing by Eloi du Cinema. 
- My instagram: https://www.instagram.com/eloiducinema/
